dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so from March 19 to 23? And uh, March 22, just Abai Avenue, like, from 6 AM to 11:30 AM? And ten routes? TEN?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so from March nineteen to twenty three? And uh, March twenty two, just Abai Avenue, like, from six A M to eleven thirty a m? And ten routes? T E N?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temporary traffic restrictions will be introduced on several streets in Almaty from March 19 to 23. ... on March 22 from 6 AM to 11:30 AM, Abai Avenue will be temporarily closed ... The movement of routes No. 16, 37, 48, 126, 201, 205, 206, 209, 210 and 224 will also be changed during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, so? It's temporary. Five days, one morning closure for a main street.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, so? It's temporary. Five days, one morning closure for a main street.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temporary traffic restrictions will be introduced on several streets in Almaty from March 19 to 23. ... on March 22 from 6 AM to 11:30 AM, Abai Avenue will be temporarily closed

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five days! And ten bus routes affected! People need to get to work, like, what are they supposed to do?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five days! And ten bus routes affected! People need to get to work, like, what are they supposed to do?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: from March 19 to 23. ... The movement of routes No. 16, 37, 48, 126, 201, 205, 206, 209, 210 and 224 will also be changed during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They, um, they clearly state "choose alternative routes in advance." It's not a surprise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They, um, they clearly state choose alternative routes in advance. It's not a surprise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The city authorities ask that these changes be taken into account when planning routes and that alternative routes be chosen in advance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Choose alternative routes"? What alternative routes? The whole city is going to be a standstill, uh, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Choose alternative routes? What alternative routes? The whole city is going to be a standstill, uh, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it won't. It's just a few streets. The detours are already planned for Kabanbay Batyr and Bogenbay Batyr.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it won't. It's just a few streets. The detours are already planned for Kabanbay Batyr and Bogenbay Batyr.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The detour around Astana Square will be carried out along Kabanbay Batyr Street in the eastern direction and along Bogenbay Batyr Street in the western direction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "A few streets"? Tole Bi is a major artery! And Abai? Come on! This is going to be chaos. Utter chaos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A few streets? Tole Bi is a major artery! And Abai? Come on! This is going to be chaos. Utter chaos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Chaos? It's a few hours on one day for Abai. And the other one, Tole Bi, is a section, not the whole thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chaos? It's a few hours on one day for Abai. And the other one, Tole Bi, is a section, not the whole thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: on March 22 from 6 AM to 11:30 AM, Abai Avenue will be temporarily closed ... the restriction will be introduced on the section of Tole Bi Street from Nazarbayev Avenue to Abylay Khan Street.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But for four whole days! For Tole Bi! People have plans, appointments, they can't just, like, suddenly reroute their entire lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But for four whole days! For Tole Bi! People have plans, appointments, they can't just, like, suddenly reroute their entire lives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temporary traffic restrictions will be introduced on several streets in Almaty from March 19 to 23.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's called planning ahead, my friend. The city authorities literally asked them to. It's not a mystery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's called planning ahead, my friend. The city authorities literally asked them to. It's not a mystery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The city authorities ask that these changes be taken into account when planning routes and that alternative routes be chosen in advance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Planning ahead for something that disrupts, uh, like, ten lines of public transport? That's just ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Planning ahead for something that disrupts, uh, like, ten lines of public transport? That's just ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The movement of routes No. 16, 37, 48, 126, 201, 205, 206, 209, 210 and 224 will also be changed during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, what's ridiculous is acting like the world is ending because of some temporary traffic changes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, what's ridiculous is acting like the world is ending because of some temporary traffic changes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The world might not be ending, but people's morning commutes definitely are. Imagine the queues!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The world might not be ending, but people's morning commutes definitely are. Imagine the queues!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: People adapt, Host_A. They always do. This happens in every major city, um, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People adapt, Host_A. They always do. This happens in every major city, um, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But not this badly! This is just poor, um, poor management of city infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But not this badly! This is just poor, um, poor management of city infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's city management doing their job, probably for some essential works. You don't know the full story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's city management doing their job, probably for some essential works. You don't know the full story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know what I read. Ten bus routes, five days, major streets closed. That's a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know what I read. Ten bus routes, five days, major streets closed. That's a mess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: from March 19 to 23. ... The movement of routes No. 16, 37, 48, 126, 201, 205, 206, 209, 210 and 224 will also be changed during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a minor inconvenience. Get over it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a minor inconvenience. Get over it.
